channel.title: OpenResty on Tomi Mulhartono
channel.description: Recent content in OpenResty on Tomi Mulhartono

item.title: Getting Started with Your New Application on OpenResty Edge: An Easy-to-Follow Tutorial
item.description: Welcome aboard! If you’re gearing up to launch a new application on OpenResty Edge, you’re in the right place. Whether you’re a seasoned pro or just starting out, I’ll walk you through every step of the way with a dash of fun. Grab your favorite drink, settle in, and let’s dive into this setup adventure! Creating Your New Application Alright, let’s get that shiny new application up and running. Login to your OpenResty Edge Dashboard On the top bar, look for the Applications menu.
